title: France panorama. [No. 67/48]
brief_description: French cinemagazine items including: 1. The French political scene - President de Gaulle’s press conference. 2. Old and new techniques: In the Vosges Mountains - wood-sledging. the automobile and sports. Oil and proteins. 3. Marceau the mime. 4. Grenoble before the Winter Olympics.
